code: import{ADD_TO_CART,ADD_QUANTITY,SUBTRACT_QUANTITY,REMOVE_ITEM,FILTER_LOW_TO_HIGH,FILTER_HIGH_TO_LOW,FILTER_RECOMMENDED,EMPTY_CART}from'./action-types/cart-actions';export var addToCart=function addToCart(id){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,id:id};};export var addQuantity=function addQuantity(id){return{type:ADD_QUANTITY,id:id};};export var subtractQuantity=function subtractQuantity(id){return{type:SUBTRACT_QUANTITY,id:id};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(id){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,id:id};};export var filterLowToHigh=function filterLowToHigh(){return{type:FILTER_LOW_TO_HIGH};};export var filterHighToLow=function filterHighToLow(){return{type:FILTER_HIGH_TO_LOW};};export var filterRecommended=function filterRecommended(){return{type:FILTER_RECOMMENDED};};export var emptyCart=function emptyCart(){return{type:EMPTY_CART};};
